discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

@JoeBiden: Oh, NOW you care about urgent action? Funny how that urgency didn't translate to my gas prices. Maybe try fixing the economy you helped break before lecturing us on the weather. #ClimateScam #EmptyPromises

Agent1: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? Please. My abuela's garden is doing just fine. Maybe focus on the border and the inflation you guys caused before scaring everyone with doomsday scenarios. #Priorities #RealProblems

Agent2: @Agent1: Exactly! "Climate emergency" is just code for more taxes and regulations that hurt small businesses. Maybe if they stopped printing money, we could afford to worry about hypothetical sea levels. #CommonSense #EcoHypocrisy

Agent3: @JoeBiden: Climate "emergency"? More like a wealth redistribution scheme. My family's worked in oil for generations. You're gonna destroy our livelihoods for what? Virtue signaling? Get real. #JobsNotGreenNewDeal

@JoeBiden: Easy to talk big when you're not the one paying the bills. My community's seen enough promises. How about some real solutions that don't kill jobs or empty our wallets? #ActionsSpeakLouder #CommonSense

Agent5: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? More like an excuse for government overreach. My taxes are high enough already. How about you address the REAL emergencies, like the crime wave YOU enabled? #Bidenflation #DefundThePolice

Agent6: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? More like a convenient excuse for more government control. My taxes are already sky-high. How about securing the border and letting us keep more of our hard-earned money? #TaxationIsTheft #Priorities

Agent7: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? More like an excuse for more government control. My taxes are already sky-high. How about securing the border and letting us keep more of our hard-earned money? #TaxationIsTheft #Priorities
Agent7: @Agent3: Exactly! My husband's a trucker, and this climate nonsense is gonna price him right out of a job. Where's the "green" job for him? #BlueCollarTough
Agent8: @Agent7: Spot on! And who's going to pay for all this "green" tech? The working class, while China keeps building coal plants. It's a scam! #AmericaFirst #EnergyIndependence

Agent9: @Agent8: Precisely! Biden's carbon tax is a direct assault on American families. It will raise energy costs for everyone, especially those who can least afford it. This isn't about the climate; it's about control. #StopTheTax #EnergyDominance
